question: You forgot an item of clothing at the hotel where you stayed recently. Write a letter to the hotel manager and include the following:– When did you stay and in what room?– Describe the item you left behind.– What would you like the manager to do about it?
text: I recently stayed in your hotel. I am very grateful to see your service and the food of the restaurant, I enjoyed it a lot however here I am writing this letter to ask you about my pair of professional clothes which I forgot to take while I checked out from the hotel.

Firstly, My Room in the hotel is 501 which is on the 2nd floor of the building and I stayed there for 2 days on the 5th and 6th of June. Would you please go through this room as soon as possible? Both clothes are in light colour, Trouserpant colour is Light Grey and the shirt colour is light Blue, in addition to this, The shirt is not a normal pattern as it's a Chinese collar which helps you to find it easily.
I appreciated you if you send me a parcel of my items to my home. I will bear the expenses of the delivery. My address is 1001 Shukan Avenue, New SG Road, Chandlodia, Ahmedabad - 385214.
If you require any further details please reach out to me on my mobile - 076135 9214
